thread.title_full: Palate Fest goes to Goa – Collaborates with the International Film Festival of India

author: Creatigies Communications Palate Fest goes to Goa – Collaborates with the International Film Festival of India LLOYD comes on board as the Presenting Sponsor of all the three Palate Fests to be held across Goa and New Delhi Oct 01, 2015 10:30 IST
title: Palate Fest goes to Goa – Collaborates with the International Film Festival of India
text:
New Delhi, Delhi, India The International Film Festival of India, Palate International Food Village will be the first of its kind international level world class food festival. The first edition of the Palate festival was held in Nehru Park, New Delhi, India from the 28th till the 30th of November 2014 followed by the Palate Mini from the 13 th March till the 15 th March, 2015. Palate Fest Pvt. Ltd. will now bring the country’s biggest food enthusiasts’ party over four delicious days from the 20th till 23rd November on the sidelines of the 46th International Film Festival of India, 2015 in Panaji, Goa. The Palate International Food Village will show case India’s finest restaurants, chefs, produce, growers, entertainers and musicians. Goa will come alive with tons of culinary experiences to explore, a medley of tastings, events, promotions and celebrations like the city has never seen before. The Festival makes a great day and night out with fabulous tastings, dinners, food markets, cookery work- shops, and live entertainment. Events begin late-morning till 10 at night.
The Food Festival will be filled for the duration with exclusive fine dining experiences, plethora of trendy and stand-alone restaurants, fun & free events, and plenty of art and live entertainment.
The Palate International Food Village, Goa, on the sidelines of the 46th International Film Festival of India, 2015 in Goa will be a fantastic celebration of the wonderful variety of food and drink that Indian Restaurants, Producers, Manufactures, Retailers, and Importers have to offer. It will be a brilliant platform to talk, taste and buy from the above. This food festival will show case at least 25-40 restaurant stalls. You will be able to rub shoulders with India’s top chefs from the best restaurants and likeminded foodies as you graze through your dream tasting menus designed by India’s latest, greatest, and hottest restaurants.
Event Schedule 2015-16:
Goa - 20 th November – 23 rd November, 2015 at Panaji
Delhi - 27 th December – 29 th December, 2015 at Nehru Park, Chanakyapuri
Delhi - 12 th February – 14 th February, 2016 at Nehru Park, Chanakyapuri
New Delhi Palate will be at the same iconic location, The Nehru Park, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi, where nearly 60 food outlets, from exciting pop up Five Star restaurants to the local favourites serving the widest variety of cuisine.
According to Ruchi Sibal and Aditi Kapoor, Co-Founders- Palate Fest : “Having Palate grow from a single Festival to multi-locations reinforces our belief in the quality of the Festival. LLOYD has come on board as the presenting Sponsor, and we are delighted to see this as a long term 3 year association with one of India’s top brands.”
“ We came on board with Palate when Creatigies suggested this to us early this year. From being ‘powered by‘ sponsors of the Palate Mini Fest to upgrading and reinforcing our relationship with Palate as ‘Presenting Sponsors’ gives us great delight. As LLOYD is ever expanding its range of appliances, including the new launches of the UHD and Curved TVS, the air purifiers, Heaters etc. LLOYD looks at this long term association with Palate and Creatigies as one that will constantly add to LLOYD’s brand value” said Nipun Singhal, Director – LLOYD Electric and Engineering Ltd.
“ Creatigies has been associated with Palate since inception and it truly delights us to see it going places. The LLOYD partnership again clearly demonstrates that brands want to connect directly with their TG, giving a real Hands-on experience of the products. As Marketing Partners of Palate, we look at making this an even stronger relationship with each passing yea r.” said Navroze D Dhondy, Managing Director, Creatigies Communications.
About LLOYD Electric & Engineering Limited
Achieving the highest quality standards and sustaining them over an extended period of time has been the cornerstone of Lloyd Electric and Engineering’s success over the past two decades. With an eye for detail & a collaborative approach with its clients, Lloyd has continuously raised the standards for both product delivery and service support. LLOYD offers a host of consumer durable products from air conditioners to LED televisions, Washing Machines, Refrigerators, Air Purifiers and small home appliances.
About Palate Fest Pvt. Ltd.
Each country or city in the world has unique culinary treasures & food traditions. Palate fest came into conception when two dynamic entrepreneurs Ruchi Sibal & Aditi Kapoor got together to celebrate exactly this, beginning from their home state, New Delhi before they take it far & wide.
About Creatigies Communications
Creatigies Communications, a media, innovations and sports management agency has been instrumental in establishing this partnership. The company has become synonymous with breakthroughs in sports management have been pioneers in creating partnerships for each of the Cricket League teams, the Wisden Awards, Predikta, Superskills, and the Indian Super League etc.
